Grupo 1 Mapeamento de Lifestyle Medicine Observation Codes to Logical Observation Identifiers, Names and Codes (LOINC)

Código fonteRelacionamentoCódigo de destinoComentário
body-composition-panel (Body composition measurement panel)is related to77233-5 (Percentage of body fat by Bioelectrical impedance analysis)LOINC has no dedicated BIA panel code. Map to individual BIA measurement codes: 77233-5 (body fat %), 73965-6 (muscle mass %), 73708-0 (fat mass). This maps to the primary BIA metric.

name: ConceptMapBodyMetricsToLOINC
title: Body Metrics to LOINC Mapping
description: Operational ConceptMap for body composition measurement terminology translation. Enables runtime $translate operations for semantic interoperability between consumer bioimpedance scales and LOINC standard terminology.
purpose: Provides semantic mappings from custom body composition codes to standard LOINC codes. Consumer body composition scales measure metrics like body fat percentage, lean mass, BMI via bioimpedance analysis (BIA).

target.display: Percentage of body fat by Bioelectrical impedance analysis
target.comment: LOINC has no dedicated BIA panel code. Map to individual BIA measurement codes: 77233-5 (body fat %), 73965-6 (muscle mass %), 73708-0 (fat mass). This maps to the primary BIA metric.
